attributes.review:
i was hoping to get a good president and i got this! dear lord! this software is horrible. kicks me out of the app each time. think it might be a set up just to get downloads. the app is showing black screens when i’m using it. do NOT download this app! 

another thing that’s wrong is the time zone! every time i click out of the app it sets my phone forward THREE DAYS! what even?! horrible. needs to be taken down.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!

attributes.review: I love my Trumpie more than any other racist out there, so you can only imagine my excitement of downloading his app. To my surprise the first encounter I had on this app was a random orange man asking for my number. Of course I wasn’t wearing my glasses so I couldn’t tell is that was my dump trump or not. But alas my anxiety got the best of me and I had a huge panic attack! now my toes are missing that’s all i hate this app and what it has done to me.
attributes.title: All of my toes are missing.

attributes.review: I downloaded the app😱 to educate📚myself🧍🏾‍♀️ on the big racist, homophobic , pedo ect of a president🕴🏽it took 7 hours to download🤬 and it was really laggy😔not to mention I had great✨wifi . So i turnt my phone off📲and 2 ninjas turtles 🐢 🐢came in my room and tried to throw me off the roof☠️then I kicked🤸🏽‍♀️them with my 12 in foot 🦶 but 10 more came in my house and took my fingers off🤚🏽im now typing with my toes😡this app make me feel mad😠 take👉it away😾now!
attributes.title: 🌸😡❤️✨🧚🏽‍♀️🤬

attributes.review: i've had this app for 4 days and every single omg of them have been worse than the last 😡... on the first day my phone was glitching . on the second day i got PORNOGRAGHY pop ups 😱! on the third day my phone would just cut off and have a satanic screensaver waiting for me 😥. and on the fourth day.... the app leaked all my personal info to third party apps and recorded me through my phone without my consent 😤
attributes.title: the app crashed my phone !

attributes.review: This app is the absolutely most dreadful app I’ve ever downloaded! It took two months to finally download! And once downloaded it kept sending me notifications every minute of the day! There was a constant singing and it just wouldn’t stop. It infiltrated my camera roll with images of squidwards penis and I couldn’t delete the photos! Absolutely dreadful and irritating.
attributes.title: Horrible! Would not recommend!

attributes.review: I was just sitting here, trynna kick it with my president and educate myself, when the app suddenly commanded my chihuahua to beat my cat and then to proceed by eating it. The cat was unable to defend itself and suffered a merciless execution. It later controlled my chihuahua and made her sacrifice my GRANDMA to this orange plump in the sky, fortunately my grandma was able to escape by beating my Chihuahua with her sandal. Me and my family will forever be haunted by this terrifying experience and my chihuahua will never be the same.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what all the hype was about and let’s just say i was VERY disappointed. when i tried to download this disgusting app it took months to load. then once it finally loaded the app was very glitchy. i restarted the app and that seemed to work, but then it started calling me “a fat pig” and other disgusting stuff. 10/10 do NOT recommend this app. if i could rate it one star i would😡
attributes.title: awful app

attributes.review: this app, wanted me to vote for the guy from the apprentice!!! this app, is so awful, it literally spat on my mother and implied that she was a llama. how rude! this app is not only disrespectful, but it’s also questionable. i have nightmares that the dude from apprentice comes to school and grabs children by their private parts! why would i vote for him? his intelligence is weak at best, and saying that his vocabulary is poor is kind compared to the truth. this app, disintegrated my phone!!!!! i had to buy a new one!! this app is horrid and i hope to never see it again. it has so many bugs that my phone was basically a cockroach. this app sells drugs to children. this app doesn’t even work. it is horrible, please take it down.
attributes.title: worst app ever!!!!

attributes.review: It’s a terrible app don’t download it!!! It took a month to download and it’s quality is the equivalent to a garbage can believe me it’s that bad! I can barley see or hear what I’m doing in the app. If your considering downloading this app do not it is not worth your time, if anything it’s wasting your time don’t even bother downloading it. -10/10 never ever getting this app ever again and neither should you 🤬😡👺
attributes.title: This app is absolute trash

attributes.review: Trump is literally so pathetic. He and his administration want to ban TikTok because it’s a “threat to national security.” Like no, bunker boy. You’re just upset that no one showed up to your dumb rally because everyone on TikTok messed with you. Is that the “threat to national security” that you’re talking about? I bet China isn’t even “using everyone’s data” like he’s claiming. He’s just upset that this platform is giving everyone a voice that needs to be heard. Eat rocks, bunker boy. ❤️
attributes.title: Lol
